title: Bib-color team assignment with smoothing
scope: Assign each player track to Team A / Team B / Unknown based on bib colors with temporal smoothing.
Expose diagnostics explaining team decisions (color evidence, smoothing, Unknown reasons).
Do not attempt jersey-number OCR or advanced re-identification (out of scope for V1).
acceptance: Team assignment includes an explicit Unknown state and does not force assignment when evidence is weak.
Outputs include diagnostics supporting audits and debugging.
Output contract template documents team assignment fields and diagnostics.

deliverables.title: Team assignment A/B/Unknown with diagnostics
acceptance: Team assignment outputs A/B/Unknown with confidence and diagnostics.
Smoothing is explicit and configurable; Unknown is used when uncertain.
evidence: A minimal pipeline run produces team assignment fields and diagnostics.

deliverables.title: Output contract template updated for team assignment
acceptance: Contract documents team assignment schema, smoothing semantics, and Unknown behavior.
evidence: `npm run generate` renders docs reflecting the updated contract template.

subtasks.title: Implement bib-color team assignment with smoothing and diagnostics (A/B/Unknown).
done_when: Team assignment is computed from color evidence with temporal smoothing.
Unknown is emitted when evidence is insufficient; diagnostics explain why.

subtasks.title: Update output contract template for team assignment fields.
done_when: Contract template documents assignment fields, confidence, diagnostics, and Unknown semantics.

subtasks.title: Define canonical team assignment record fields and diagnostics.
done_when: Record schema is explicit (team label, confidence, evidence/diagnostics).
Schema supports audits without reading implementation code.
